# a person who winds [[silk]] [[thread]] from the [[cocoon]] onto a [[spool]]
types.html:
moulinier m (plural mouliniers, feminine moulinière)

  1. a person who winds silk thread from the cocoon onto a spool
trans: a person who winds silk thread from the cocoon onto a spool
a person who winds silk thread from the cocoon onto a spool
